title: Josep Borrell - Wikipedia
snippet: Josep Borrell Fontelles (Western Catalan: [dʒuˈzɛb boˈreʎ fonˈteʎes]; born 24 April 1947) is a Spanish politician who served as High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy and Vice-President of the European Commission from 2019 to 2024.

title: Josep Borrell
snippet: Josep Borrell is Senior Distinguished Fellow at the Elcano Royal Institute, and president of CIDOB (Barcelona Centre for International Affairs).

title: Josep Borrell assumes the post of EU High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy and Vice-President of the European Commission | EEAS
snippet: On 1 December, Josep Borrell assumed the post of EU High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy and Vice-President of the European Commission.
